comment:
The language's name in itself.
Used in option menu.

The list of localizer names, seperated by commas.
Used in information menu.

zh-Hans: 轻触屏幕 / 鼠标 / 任意键

en:
Lower value reduces audio latency,
but may cause audio issues such as stuttering.
zh-Hans:
数值越小，音频延迟越低，
但也越可能出现卡壳等问题。

en: Touch anywhere on the screen. Circles should appear around your fingertips.
zh-Hans: 请轻触屏幕上任意位置。触点周围会出现圆圈。

en:
1. <indent=5%>Choose the input device(s) you wish to calibrate, then play the notes below. (for keyboard you can use any letter or number key)</indent>
2. <indent=5%>Adjust note offset until you feel the timing of notes and keysounds are correct.</indent>
3. <indent=5%>Adjust input latency until the reported time differences get close to 0.</indent>
zh-Hans:
1. <indent=5%>选择待校对的输入设备，然后演奏下方的音符。（在键盘上可以使用任意字母、数字键）</indent>
2. <indent=5%>调整音符偏移，直到你感觉音符以及按键音的时机与背景音乐完全同步。</indent>
3. <indent=5%>调整输入延迟，直到游戏报告的时间差接近于0。</indent>
读取谱面时重新读取皮肤
